mapper.select: select partNo as exPartNo, partName as exPartName from ex_part order by partNo asc

select ex.exerciseNo as exNo, ex.exerciseName as exName, p.partName as exPartName, ex.unit as unit from exercise ex, ex_part p where ex.trainerNo = #{trainerNo} and ex.exercisepart = p.partNo order by ex.exerciseNo asc

select exp.exPartNo as exPartNo, p.partName as exPartName from ex_part p, (select exPartNo, count(*) from (select e.exercisepart as exPartNo from exercise e, ex_part p where e.exercisepart = p.partno and e.trainerno = #{trainerNo}) group by exPartNo order by exPartNo) exp where p.partNo = exp.expartno

select e.exerciseno as exNo, e.exercisename as exName, e.unit as unit from exercise e, ex_part p where e.exercisepart = p.partNo and e.trainerNo = #{trainerNo} and e.exercisepart = #{exPartNo} order by e.exerciseno asc
select ex.exerciseNo as exNo, ex.exerciseName as exName, p.partName as exPartName, ex.unit as unit from exercise ex, ex_part p where ex.exerciseNo = #{exNo} and ex.exercisepart = p.partNo
mapper.insert:
select seq_exerciseno.nextVal from dual
insert into exercise values(#{exNo}, #{trainerNo}, #{exName}, #{exPartNo}, #{unit})
mapper.delete: delete exercise where exerciseNo = #{exNo} and trainerNo = #{trainerNo}
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(s.startTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd') startTime, s.scheduleNo FROM schedule s left outer join pt p ON s.ptNo = p.ptNo WHERE p.userNo = #{userNo} AND TO_CHAR(s.startTime, 'yyyymmdd') < TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') ORDER by s.startTime desc

SELECT exe.exerciseName exName, exe.partName exPart, exe.unit, countS.setCount FROM (SELECT distinct ex.exercisename, p.partName, ex.unit, ex.exerciseno FROM ex_part p RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT e.exerciseno, e.exercisepart, e.exercisename, e.unit FROM records r LEFT OUTER JOIN exercise e ON r.exerciseno = e.exerciseno WHERE r.scheduleNo = (SELECT Max(s.scheduleNo) FROM schedule s left outer join pt p ON s.ptNo = p.ptNo WHERE p.userNo = #{userNo} AND TO_CHAR(s.startTime, 'yyyymmdd') < TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd'))) ex ON p.partNo = ex.exercisepart) exe, (SELECT count(e.exerciseno) setCount, e.exerciseno FROM records r LEFT OUTER JOIN exercise e ON r.exerciseno = e.exerciseno WHERE r.scheduleNo = (SELECT Max(s.scheduleNo) FROM schedule s left outer join pt p ON s.ptNo = p.ptNo WHERE p.userNo = #{userNo} AND TO_CHAR(s.startTime, 'yyyymmdd') < TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')) GROUP BY e.exerciseno) countS WHERE exe.exerciseno = counts.exerciseno

SELECT ex.exercisename exName, ex.count, ex.amount FROM ex_part p RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT e.exercisepart, e.exercisename, r.count, r.amount FROM records r LEFT OUTER JOIN exercise e ON r.exerciseno = e.exerciseno WHERE r.scheduleNo = (SELECT Max(s.scheduleNo) FROM schedule s LEFT OUTER JOIN pt p ON s.ptNo = p.ptNo WHERE p.userNo = #{userNo} AND TO_CHAR(s.startTime, 'yyyymmdd') < TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd'))) ex ON p.partNo = ex.exercisepart

SELECT exe.exerciseName exName, exe.partName exPart, exe.unit, countS.setCount FROM (SELECT distinct ex.exerciseName, p.partName, ex.unit FROM ex_part p RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT e.exerciseName, e.exercisePart, e.unit, e.exerciseNo FROM exercise e RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT r.exerciseNo FROM records r LEFT OUTER JOIN schedule s ON r.scheduleno = s.scheduleno WHERE r.scheduleno = #{scheduleNo}) re on e.exerciseNo = re.exerciseNo) ex ON p.partNo = ex.exercisePart) exe, (select e.exerciseName, COUNT(e.exerciseName) setCount FROM exercise e RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT r.exerciseNo FROM records r LEFT OUTER JOIN schedule s ON r.scheduleno = s.scheduleno WHERE r.scheduleno = #{scheduleNo}) re ON e.exerciseNo = re.exerciseNo GROUP BY e.exerciseName) countS WHERE exe.exercisename = counts.exercisename

SELECT e.exerciseName exName, re.count, re.amount, re.startTime recordDate FROM exercise e RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT r.exerciseNo, r.count, r.amount, to_char(s.starttime, 'yyyy-mm-dd') startTime FROM records r left outer join schedule s ON r.scheduleno = s.scheduleno WHERE r.scheduleno = #{scheduleNo}) re ON e.exerciseNo = re.exerciseNo
